business.name: Smash & Spice
business.description: Experience the rich taste of traditional Middle Eastern cuisine with our carefully crafted kebabs, wraps, and sides. Made with fresh ingredients and authentic spices.

hero.subHeadline: Experience the rich flavors of traditional kebabs, wraps, and sides made with fresh ingredients and authentic spices.

left.title: Chicken Kebab Special
left.description: Tender chicken marinated in authentic spices and grilled to perfection

rightTop.title: Lamb Shawarma
rightTop.description: Slow-cooked lamb with garlic sauce and fresh vegetables

content.intro: Welcome to Smash & Spice, where every dish tells a story of tradition, passion, and authentic Middle Eastern flavors.
content.tradition: Our recipes have been passed down through generations, preserving the authentic taste of Middle Eastern cuisine while adapting to modern tastes.
content.halal: We are proud to be Halal certified, ensuring that all our ingredients and preparation methods meet the highest standards of quality and authenticity.

values.title: Fresh Ingredients
values.description: We source the freshest ingredients daily to ensure the best quality in every dish.

values.title: Authentic Recipes
values.description: Our recipes are passed down through generations, maintaining the authentic taste of Middle Eastern cuisine.

values.title: Halal Certified
values.description: All our ingredients and preparation methods are Halal certified, meeting the highest standards.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.orderOnlineDescription: Get your favorite dishes delivered right to your door

seo.pageTitle: Smash & Spice - Authentic Middle Eastern Cuisine
seo.metaDescription: Experience authentic Middle Eastern flavors with our kebabs, wraps, and sides. Fresh ingredients, Halal certified, and traditional recipes.
